mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (bookmark_seq, user_seq, store_seq) VALUES (bookmark_seq.nextval, #{userSeq}, #{storeSeq})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmark WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND store_seq = #{storeSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bookmark WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND store_seq = #{storeSeq}
